channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- atomic-openshift

item.title: CVE-2018-1102|2024-08-05T03:51:49.044Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- atomic-openshift
item.description: A flaw was found in source-to-image function as shipped with Openshift Enterprise 3.x. An improper path validation of tar files in ExtractTarStreamFromTarReader in tar/tar.go leads to privilege escalation.
